thread.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange Kraken Pulls Out of Japan

author: Mayumi Negishi
title: Cryptocurrency Exchange Kraken Pulls Out of Japan
text:
TOKYO—San Francisco-based cryptocurrency exchange Kraken is ending its trading services for Japanese residents after regulators stepped up oversight in the country, one of the world’s biggest bitcoin-trading hubs.
Kraken told customers Tuesday in an email that it plans to focus on other countries but might resume services in Japan later. Ryushi Watanabe, head of Kraken’s Japan operations, declined to comment on reasons for the pullout.
